Locations.name: Lobby
Locations.description: The lobby is a dust room empty of furnishings. Small scuffs cover the floor. A well-used room in an old building. Poorly cared for.

Locations.name: Main Hall
Locations.description: The Main Hall was once a grand space. Rugs and tapestries now covered in dust and mold. The air is still. You can almost hear the sounds of merriment that once echoed here.

Locations.name: Coat Room
Locations.description: Half empty coat racks line the walls. Red velvet wainscoting. The room is warm and quiet. Inviting. Still.

Locations.name: Water Closet
Locations.description: The bathroom is clean and in good order; white tile floors and and porcelain pedestal sinks. Sound echoes here.

Locations.name: East Wing
Locations.description: The East Wing is cold. The doors to the rooms in this wing are closed and locked. The lights flicker every so often

Locations.name: West Wing
Locations.description: The West Wing is warm. Some of the doors are open. Cleaning carts stand in the hall. The air is humid outside one of the doors. Thee shower inside recently run.
